abstract: NBA and its players' union return to bargaining table for marathon session in attempt to resolve the lockout.
snippet: There was no outward hint of progress -- other than the length of the meeting and the agreement to continue the talks.
lead_paragraph: There was no outward hint of progress -- other than the length of the meeting and the agreement to continue the talks.

headline.main: N.B.A. Talks Pause After 16-Hour Marathon Meeting
headline.print_headline: Mediator Guides N.B.A. Talks in Marathon Session
headline.seo: N.B.A. Talks Pause After 16-Hour Marathon Meeting
